item.title: Welcome to the Blog
item.description: Hi, there and welcome to the Blog. ðŸ‘‹ On here, I want to write about my experience being in Cybersecurity as well as document my journey in this massive and rapidly evolving field. When I’m not working, I try to learn new skills as well as doing Penetration Testing, Bug-Bountys and participating in CTF events. CTFs and plattforms like Hack The Box are a great place to meet new people with the same interests and goals.
